articles.title: NASA names 24th astronaut class, including prior SpaceX crew member - Ars Technica
articles.description: NASA has named its new class of astronaut candidates. The space agency introduced the four men and six women who comprise its 2025 trainee group.

articles.title: Few Oregonians know Tillamook is home to a cutting-edge aerospace company - Oregon Public Broadcasting - OPB
articles.description: Aerostar Tillamook specializes in putting together high-tech fabric to build things like high-altitude balloons, airtight spacecraft membranes and airbags to keep spacecraft upright during splashdown.
articles.content:
When the International Space Station needed an airtight membrane, NASA turned to Aerostar Tillamook.
